text: aur tauret jo mere saamane maujood hai main usakee tasadeeq karata hoon aur (mere aane kee) ek garaz yah (bhee) hai ki jo cheeje tum par haraam hai unamen se baaz ko (hukme khuda se) halaal kar doon aur main tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraf se (apanee naboovat kee) nishaanee lekar tumhaare paas aaya hoon
